name: A Proud Zinco Product
effect: KO target equipment with cost 1 or less. Gain 2 endurance.
"New and improved, my ass."

name: Abe Sapien, icthyo sapien
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Abe Sapien gets -1 DEF while visible.
Whenever a character named Hellboy you control becomes powered-up, that character gets an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack.
"I need help. I wonder where Abe is . . ."

name: Abe Sapien, Langdon Everett Caul
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Abe Sapien gets -1 DEF while visible.
At the start of the recovery phase, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card into your KO'd pile.
"You always were the practical one, Abraham."

name: Accept Your Destiny
effect:
As an additional cost to play Accept Your Destiny, exhaust a Thule Society character you control.
KO target stunned character and gain endurance equal to its cost.
"Be not too quick to refuse your destiny, creature."

name: B.P.R.D. HQ
effect:
B.P.R.D. HQ is not unique.
When you flip B.P.R.D. HQ, you may discard a B.P.R.D. character card. If you do, search your deck for a B.P.R.D. character card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
Activate >>> Target hidden defender you control has reinforcement this attack.

name: B.P.R.D. Signal Device
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Equipped character gets +1 DEF.
Pay 1 endurance >>> Equipped character cannot be the target of effects your opponents control this turn.

name: Baba Yaga, Witch
effect:
Reservist
When Baba Yaga comes into play, you may put an Army character card with cost 3 or less from your KO'd pile into the front row of your hidden or visible area.
"Come out, babies . . . Grandmother wants to see you."

name: Ben Daimio, Captain Zombie
effect:
Reservist
Ben Daimio gets +2 DEF while equipped.
Leader: Characters adjacent to Ben Daimio can attack hidden characters.
"Time to die, you slimy sacks of pus!"

name: Black Flame, Mr. Pope
effect:
Reservist
Discard an Army character card >>> Power-up target Thule Society attacker or defender you control.
"Their master has come . . . and they need to know who I am!"

name: Bloodthirsty Werewolves, Army
effect: Bloodthirsty Werewolves gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF while you have the initiative.
"You can do better than that! Big monster like you . . ."

name: Break off the Horns
effect: Ready target character named Hellboy if he is the only visible character you control. He cannot cause breakthrough this turn.
"It's my damn life, and I'll do what I want with it."

name: Cavendish Hall, Team-Up
effect:
Flip Cavendish Hall only if you control a Thule Society character.
Crossover Thule Society and B.P.R.D.
Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack.
"A place of death. Old death."

name: Concussion Grenade
effect: KO Concussion Grenade >>> Replace target location. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"I think our best bet here is to blow up this whole damn castle."

name: Conqueror Worm, Ultimate Destroyer
effect: Whenever Conqueror Worm stuns a character, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Conqueror Worm.
"There is no end to the hunger."

name: Damn Nazis, Army
effect: When Damn Nazis comes into play, it gets +1 ATK this turn.
"Well, at least we started strong."

name: Dual Sidearms
effect: Equipped character gets +2 ATK and has range.
"Yeah, but can you hit anything?"

name: Flying Kick
effect: Target character gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn and has flight this turn.
"I hope that hurt."

name: Frickin' Frog Monsters, Army
effect: Frickin' Frog Monsters gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF while attacking an exhausted defender.
"It seems my froggy friend is tough enough to take whatever I hand out."

name: Grigori Rasputin, The Mad Monk
effect:
Grigori Rasputin gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF for each doomsday counter on resources you control.
Whenever Grigori Rasputin becomes stunned, you may put a doomsday counter on a resource named Project Ragna Rok.
"You are not the first who has tried to destroy me, creature."

name: Grigori Rasputin, True Father
effect: Pay X endurance >>> KO target stunned character with cost X. Use this power only once per turn.
"I am your master, your true father upon this plane."

name: Hecate, Major Mythological Figure
effect:
Reservist, Concealed
At the start of the combat phase, you may have the controller of target hidden character move it to the front row of his visible area.
"It is for us to darken the sun, turn the moon to blood, and put out the stars."

name: Hellboy, Anung Un Rama
effect:
Whenever Hellboy stuns a character, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Hellboy if he is the only visible character you control.
Pay 1 endurance >>> Return target character you control to its owner's hand. Use this power only once per turn.
"I sometimes get angry."

name: Hellboy, Little Boy
effect: Hellboy gets +1 ATK for each other B.P.R.D. character you control.
"It's a demon come from Hell to destroy us all!"

name: Hellboy, The Right Hand of Doom
effect:
When Hellboy comes into play, you may return all other characters you control to their owners' hands. If you returned at least one B.P.R.D. character, stun target character with cost 6 or less.
Whenever Hellboy stuns a character, put a doomsday counter on or remove a counter from target resource named Project Ragna Rok.

name: Herman von Klempt, Head in a Jar
effect:
Concealed
Activate >>> Target attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF this attack.
"You have my permission to exercise the full extent of your inhuman strength!"

name: Huge, Annoying Tentacles, Army
effect: Whenever a Thule Society character you control with cost 4 or less attacks a character, exhaust that character.
"At their touch I go numb all over."

name: Hunte Castle
effect:
Hidden characters you control get +1 ATK.
Activate >>> Target Thule Society character you control can attack hidden characters this turn.
"This is the worst place on Earth."

name: Ilsa Haupstein, Great Heart
effect: Activate, discard a card >>> Search your deck for an ongoing plot twist card or a card named Grigori Rasputin, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Ilsa, you set these events in motion, and now they will play out as they will."

name: Inner Sanctum
effect: Activate >>> Whenever a B.P.R.D. defender you control becomes stunned this attack, you may stun target character with cost 3 or less if you control exactly one character.

name: Into Hiding
effect: Move target character you control with the printed Thule Society affiliation to your hidden area.
"Hidden from the eyes of God . . . wrapped in darkness and dreaming."

name: Jetpack
effect: Equipped character gets +2 ATK and has flight.
"That's your ignition switch. Roll your shoulders to turn, and watch your tail."

name: Johann Kraus, Contained Spirit
effect: At the start of the combat phase, you may return a B.P.R.D. character card from your KO'd pile to your hand.
"This man seems to know things . . . things that we should know."

name: Johann Kraus, Free Spirit
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Whenever Johann Kraus becomes stunned, you may recover a stunned character you control. If you recovered a visible character, move it to your hidden area.
"I have already died once, in a way. There is little for me to fear save oblivion."

name: Karl Ruprecht Kroenen, Creator of the Apocalypse Army
effect:
Evasion
At the start of the combat phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Army Thule Society character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
"The apocalypse army is now complete and numbers six hundred and sixty-six."

name: Kate Corrigan, Folklore Consultant
effect: When Kate Corrigan comes into play, if you recruited her from your hand, you may return her to your hand. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"They said only real bureau field agents this time."

name: Klaus Werner von Krupt, Project Leader
effect: Leader: While attacking a character, attackers adjacent to Klaus Werner von Krupt get +1 ATK for each non-stunned character adjacent to Klaus Werner von Krupt.
"Herr Hitler does not take kindly to failure."

name: Kriegaffes, Army
effect: Whenever Kriegaffes becomes stunned, target opponent loses 2 endurance.
"Guess there's no point in tryin' to reason with you, huh, furball?"

name: Leopold Kurtz, Loyal Assistant
effect: KO Leopold Kurtz >>> Power-up an attacker or defender you control.
"Rasputin is Master! Death for you!"

name: Liz Sherman, Pyrokinesis
effect: Activate, return Liz Sherman to her owner's hand >>> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. Use this power only if you control another B.P.R.D. character.
"In twenty-three years I've quit thirteen times, but I always come back. Where else am I going to go?"

name: Liz Sherman, Uncontrolled Power
effect:
Reservist
Activate >>> Each player loses 8 endurance.
Pay 4 resource points >>> KO target character with cost 5 or less.
"The fire is not my enemy. It is a part of me."

name: Lobster Johnson, Ghost?
effect:
Reservist
When Lobster Johnson comes into play, you may transfer target equipment you control to him.
While equipped, Lobster Johnson gets +2 ATK and can attack protected characters.
"I've come to inflict justice!"

name: Nasty Surprise
effect: Target defender gets +5 ATK this attack.
"Jeez. You never see something like that coming."

name: Pancakes
effect:
As an additional cost to play Pancakes, discard a card.
Recover target stunned B.P.R.D. character if it is the only visible character you control. If that character is named Hellboy, it has reinforcement while defending this turn.
"He has eaten the pancake. He will never come back to us now."

name: Plague of Frogs
effect: Target Thule Society attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK / -1 DEF this attack for each character you control.
"Sir . . . you've got . . . frogs."

name: Professor Bruttenholm, Father
effect:
Concealed
When Professor Bruttenholm comes into play, you may search your deck for a card named Hellboy, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Project Ragna Rok
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, you win the game if there are four or more doomsday counters on Project Ragna Rok.
Exhaust a Thule Society character you control >>> KO target stunned B.P.R.D. character. If you do, put a doomsday counter on Project Ragna Rok. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Roger, Homunculus
effect: Whenever Roger becomes stunned, you may KO him. If you do, target player loses 4 endurance.
"That's the detonator for Roger. If anything goes wrong up there, you don't take any chances. You use that."

name: Sadu-Hem, Ancient Godling
effect:
Reservist
Whenever Sadu-Hem stuns a character, gain endurance equal to that character's cost.
"He has dined well on the flesh of men in every port from here to the Arctic Circle."

name: Sidney Leach, Human Metal Detector
effect: When Sidney Leach comes into play, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"There it is! Just where I left it."

name: Something Is Coming
effect:
Play Something Is Coming only if a player recruited Hellboy this turn and only if you control a Thule Society character.
Search your deck for a card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"I promised a miracle. I have made one."

name: Spill the Beans
effect: Target attacker or defender gets -1 ATK this attack and an additional -2 ATK this attack if you control exactly one character.
"If there's anything left in you that can still talk, start now!"

name: Thomas Manning, B.P.R.D. Director
effect: Leader: Equipped B.P.R.D. attackers adjacent to Thomas Manning cannot be stunned.
"This isn't the day for me to lose a top agent."

name: U.S. Army Ranger, Army
effect: Activate >>> Target attacker you control gets +2 DEF this attack.
"Gimme some covering fire!"

name: Wake the Devil
effect: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck and the rest on the top of your deck in any order. If you control a Thule Society character, draw a card.
"I waited, waited while the power within me grew and strengthened."

name: Weapons Lab
effect:
As an additional cost to flip Weapons Lab, discard a B.P.R.D. character card.
Activate >>> Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
Each character you control can be equipped with up to two equipment.
